name: elrefsymrels3

comment: Elements of the class of reflexive relations which are elements of the class of symmetric relations as well (like the elements of the class of equivalence relations ~ dfeqvrels3 ) can use the ` A. x e. dom R x R x ` version for their reflexive part, not just the ` A. x e. dom R A. y e. ran R ( x = y -> x R y ) ` version of ~ dfrefrels3 , cf. the comment of ~ dfrefrel3 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
